body.name: Gotham Steel Stainless Steel Premium 12” Frying Pan, Triple Ply Reinforced with Super Nonstick Ti- Cerama Copper Coating and Induction Capable Encapsulated Bottom – Dishwasher Safe

features: Stainless Steel Pan: Cook like a professional at home with the Gotham Steel Stainless Steel Frying Pan – This frying pan is constructed from triple reinforced stainless steel, engineered to be your everyday warrior for all your cooking needs from cooking eggs, to stir frying foods, to searing and braising meats, and more, for years to come, without sticking.

Ultra-Nonstick Coating: Get healthier meals, easy food release, and an effortless cleanup with Gotham Steel’s award winning ceramic nonstick coating- This frying pan is generously coated 3 times with nonstick coating, ensuring foods and liquids won’t stick to your pan while cooking for years on end, without oils or butters needed.

Durable & Lasting: Constructed from sturdy stainless steel and reinforced with diamonds, this frying pan is durable enough to withstand any metal utensils, spatulas, spoons, whisks and even electric beaters, ensuring your frying pan lasts for years to come.

Oven & Stovetop Safe: This Frying Pan is oven safe up to 500 degrees and compatible with all types of stovetops- Gas, electric, halogen, ceramic, and induction – allowing you to cook virtually anywhere you’d like.

Stay Cool Handles: Designed for safe and easy handling, this frying pan features an ergonomic stainless-steel handle, easy to use for both righties and lefties, and remains cool to the touch while on or off the stove, keeping your hands safe while cooking.

100% Healthy & Toxin Free: Keep a healthy and ecofriendly cooking environment with Gotham Steel- Each piece of cookware is 100% free of PFOA, PFOS & any other harmful chemicals, keeping your kitchen completely toxin free.

Easy Cleanup: Think quick and easy cleanups and forget about all the laborious scrubbing with- Gotham Steel cookware is design for an effortless wipe down after using and is completely dishwasher safe allowing you to throw your cookware in the dishwasher for a hassle-free cleanup experience.
Quick & Even Cooking: Constructed from stainless steel, the frying pan’s uniform heating allows for a quick and even heat distribution from end to end, cooking foods perfectly and evenly throughout.
10 Year Guarantee: Gotham Steel cookware is built to provide years of outstanding usage and is backed by a 10-year limited guarantee.
body.description: With a Triply reinforced stainless steel exterior & a Ti-Cerama interior, this is one of the most powerful frying pans form Gotham Steel! The fry pan has a high shine stainless steel chrome exterior that will elevate your kitchen. Non-stick, non-scratch (metal utensil safe), oven safe up to 500 degrees, flame-proof,. Induction compatible About the Product Gotham Steel is the first product of its class to actually utilize high-grade titanium and ceramic as surface finishing. This sophisticated combination not only ensures maximal durability it also allows for multi-fictional, all-around usage. Titanium plus Ceramic Coating FAQs High-heat threshold to sear perfectly browned steaks! Everything just slides right off, even burnt chocolate and cheese. Food flavor is not altered when cooking tomato-based or any acidic food products thanks to the ceramic component! The non-stick surface cleans easy! Versatile: for stove-top cooking, or baking! Rust-proof all over. Coating doesn't peel off with constant usage and washing. Just tell us and we will fix things for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gotham Steel Nonstick Stainless Steel Fry Pan Set Cooking doesn’t have to be complicated. We’ve recently improved on our groundbreaking Ti-Ceramic technology and design to make plating perfectly cooked food simpler than ever. Food slides right out of the non-stick pan for flawless presentation without spills or scraping. Our wide pans can handle everything from stir-fry to steak, and even withstands up to 500°F in the oven for even, stick-proof baking. You can skip breaking out extra bowls for whisking and mixing; the Gotham Steel Skillet is made to stand up to metal without scratching so you can prep your food right in the pan. Cleanup is often as simple as a quick wipe-down, but the Gotham Steel Skillet will be just fine in the dishwasher. The safety of your food is important to us, so all of our cookware is PTHE/PFOA/PFOS. Our pans are made with a sturdy stainless steel handle that we’ve engineered to be cooler to the touch than most, but please take appropriate safety precautions to avoid burns. The Gotham Steel Skillet is made for electric or gas stoves. An induction-safe version is available.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have to say that this pan is awesome. It’s heavy duty everything they say about. It is true nothing really sticks and up a little bit sticks it washes right out and for the price you cannot beat it.!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This pan so easy to clean nothing sticks to it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent frying pan
reviews.reviewText: This is a great frying pan. We used to have a teflon pan that began to peel and we purchased the same pan thinking we scratched it but we had the same problem. So we tried this pan and it's worked great. It is very easy to use, doesn't stick and super easy to wash (we have always washed by hand because it's so easy). We use a little dish soap and a scrub daddy and it works amazingly. If you are looking for a great frying pay I highly suggest this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great frying pan!
reviews.reviewText: Very non stick, you really don't need oil or butter with this pan. Well made, heavy duty. I would definitely buy another one. Its a staple up from their all aluminum version.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: Every thing to like and nothing to dislike.All of the Gotham stell products are great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Non-stick, my ass — Cheapest Quality
reviews.reviewText: Complete waste of money. In the garbage after only a few uses. I’ve only many non stick pans and they usually last about two years. I get it, no worries. I literally only use non stick pans to make scrambled eggs each morning. This pan lasted exactly ONE time before it started to have burn marks on the pan and food started sticking to the pan. Cheapest quality I’ve ever experienced. I should have returned but didn’t feel like going thru the headache. BEWARE AND SHOP ELSEWHERE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No need for butter or spray as advertised
reviews.reviewText: I bought for us just to see if all the built up hype was true. Believe me, it is. Love it😁
No stick. Ever. Beautiful finish. Handle slightly hard to hold on to (sort of flat, not rounded) but fine. Would recommend. Nice size.
I am very pleased with it.

I really do like how this is truly non-stick and I have been using it a lot. One small thing, though. Even though they say you can use metal utensils, I wouldn't. I'm already seeing a few scratches on the non-stick surface, so I've switched to plastic or wood utensils. I haven't cut anything in the pan, just used a metal egg-flipper the way I normally do but there's still scratches happening.
Ok, un peu dispendieux, mais belle apparence etbelle qualité.

We only purchased it because it could be used on an induction stove. If you love to cook, avoid this frying pan. Stuff sticks to it and it doesn’t matter the temperature. Hard to use oil or butter in it. We find it frustrating to cook with. Definitely would not recommend.
